profile:
Hydro-Flo Plumbing and Heating Ltd offers HVAC, plumbing and sewer service and installations in Edmonton Alberta and surrounding areas. The includes Leduc, Beaumont, Saint Albert, Spruce Grove, Stoney Plain, Nisku, Millet, Sherwood Park, Sturgeon County, and Fort Saskatchewan.

We operate 24 hours a day for all air conditioning, heating, sewer and plumbing emergencies.

In addition, we offer new installation of major HVAC Equipment like hot water heaters, boilers, rooftop units, furnaces, and plumbing systems.  

We also offer 24 hour drain cleaning, sewer steaming  and video line inspection.

All estimates are free and services are guaranteed. 

Financing Options are available for major equipment.

We are licensed, bonded and insured and can tackle any project from a simple service to large new construction or retrofit project.
products: hot water heaters, tankless water heaters, boilers, furnaces, water softeners, ventilation, back flow preventers, cross connection devices, plumbing and drainage systems, ventilation systems, HRV's, back water valves, gas lines, air conditioning, and HVAC.
services: HVAC, heating, cooling, plumbing and drain cleaning
brands: Payne, Carrier, Bryant, Heil, Trane, Rheem, Grundfos, Bell and Gossett, John Woods, Bradford Whyte, AO Smith, LAARS, Munchkin, Watts, Tamas, Viessmann, Navien, Takagi, Rheem, Giant, American Standard, Delta, Price Pfister, Moen, Kholer, Delta, Armstrong, Fusion, NTI, Rheem
specialities: Hydronics, Boilers, Pumps, Hot Water Tanks, HVAC,  Furnaces and Air Conditioning.
diplomas: Provincal Gas, Plumbing, and HVAC trained and certified. Epcor certified backflow preventer testing,
warranty_terms: 1 Year Warranty Workmanship/Equipment as per Manufacturer
